page.title: 03SPORT IN GREAT EASTON SCHOOL
page.content: At school we play rounders,football, netball and swim in the open air pool.The school hall is equipped with gymnastic apparatus.Over the years we have won the Braintree area trophies for football, netball, rounders and athletics.This year we won all four.In school we compete for the Barltrop cup each year.We have teams of four colours playing football and netball against each other.The four best footballers and netballers each choose a team. In the summer we have a swimming gala and a sports day.The gala consists of children swimming against each other.We do front crawl,breast stroke,back stroke, obstacle and free-style. On Sports Day, the older children compete in their teams at running, skipping and obstacle races. The younger children compete in their own events.
